General.Name: Gratifii Ltd
General.Description: Gratifii Limited, a technology company, designs and develops loyalty and rewards programs in Australia, South Africa, and Singapore. It operates Mosaic, a customer enterprise engagement cloud platform that allows businesses to customize, operate, and manage loyalty programs. The company was formerly known as Mobecom Limited and changed its name to Gratifii Limited in May 2021. Gratifii Limited is headquartered in Surry Hills, Australia.
General.Address: 44a Foveaux Street, Surry Hills, NSW, Australia, 2010
